PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Upon comparison of the absorption onset of P2-P6 , a similar trend was observed with a gradual blue - shift from P2 to P6 with higher TPD content.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| absorption onset of P2-P6 |
| a similar trend |
| a gradual blue - shift |
| from P2 to P6 |
| with higher TPD content |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| absorption onset of P2-P6 |
| a gradual blue - shift |
| from P2 to P6 |
| with higher TPD content |

Note: TPD stands for Thermal Programmed Desorption, which is a method used to analyze the adsorption or desorption behavior of materials. Therefore, "higher TPD content" can be considered a material property.
